Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of a Nomogram for Predicting High-Risk Pathology in Stage IA Lung Adenocarcinoma

Trial_Design.evidence: Participants were randomly divided into training (80%) and validation (20%) sets.

Participants.evidence: 545 patients with clinical stage IA left upper lobe (LUL) adenocarcinoma who underwent surgery between January 2018 and May 2022.

Number_Randomised.evidence: 545 patients with clinical stage IA left upper lobe (LUL) adenocarcinoma who underwent surgery between January 2018 and May 2022.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The nomogram demonstrated excellent discriminative ability, with AUCs of 0.837 in the training set and 0.865 in the validation set.
